A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Anyone who has seen this movie and thinks it's not Star Wars or its a bad movie has their head up their butt. This movie was an amazing addition to the series. My only disappointment was 


****************************WARNING MAJOR SPOILER AHEAD*****************

We didn't find out the true origin of Snoke before he is killed by Ren. That was the only let down in the story. Otherwise it was an amazingly fitting end to the characters of Luke and Leia Skywalker. It touched on many themes for the universe to move forward and not continue to repeat common themes of just Jedi versus Sith.

Also Yoda is back and literally sets thing on fire like the little goblin he was in Empire and Jedi.
